text:
The capabilities of deep learning neural networks suggest a good ﬁt for time series forecasting.
By deﬁnition and with enough resources, neural networks in general should be able to subsume
the capabilities of classical linear forecasting methods given their ability to learn arbitrary
complex mapping from inputs to outputs.
 Neural networks learn arbitrary mapping functions.
It is good practice to manually identify and remove systematic structures from time series
